Geothermal Energy.Description: Geothermal energy is harnessed and converted into electricity through geothermal power plants.
Geothermal energy is used for heating and cooling purposes through geothermal heat pumps.
Geothermal energy is derived from the heat stored within geothermal reservoirs beneath the Earth's surface.
The Geothermal Energy Association promotes the development and utilization of geothermal energy resources.
